text: "Living in Sin" is a 1989 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and is the fifth single from their fourth studio album New Jersey (1988). It went to number 9 in the United States, number 20 in Switzerland, number 35 in the United Kingdom and number 64 in Australia. Category:1989 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: Living in Sin (song)
